projects.name: Shop-Sphere
projects.description: Implemented Code Splitting and Lazy Loading to reduce initial load times and enhance user experience by dynamically loading React components. Designed and Developed RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems. Leveraged Asynchronous Programming in Node.js using async/await for efficient handling of asynchronous operations, reducing response times.

projects.name: Movie-Muse
projects.description: Integrated OMDB API for retrieving comprehensive movie data, ensuring up-to-date and accurate information. Implemented Asynchronous Data Fetching using JavaScripts fetch API and Promises to handle API requests efficiently, reducing load times. Optimized JavaScript Code by using ES6+ features and best practices to ensure maintainable and efficient codebase.

experiences.description: Led the development and integration of RESTful APIs to ensure seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems. Implemented robust data management practices, utilizing SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB) to optimize data storage and retrieval. Utilized cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) for scalable infrastructure deployment, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.

full_output.name: Abhinav Singh
achievements_and_awards: Ranked 199 in Codechef Contest OCT221D, More than 19000 coder participated
